column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I once had a flat tire on my bicycle .
#id=2
#text=It was quite a surprise when it happened .
#id=3
#text=I had been having a good time riding my bike along a trail and the air went right out of it .
#id=4
#text=I proceeded to flip my bicycle over so it was standing on the handlebars and seat to inspect the damage .
#id=5
#text=Once I had that accomplished I had to remove the wheel from the bike .
#id=6
#text=This took a little bit and I needed some tools to finish this task .
#id=7
#text=My bike has a tube in each tire to keep it inflated .
#id=8
#text=Something had gone through the outer rubber and punctured that inner tube .
#id=9
#text=I had to remove the outer rubber and find the spot on the inner tube where the hole was .
#text=Luckily I had a patch kit with me and was able to patch the tube once I found the hole .
#text=After waiting for the patch adhesive to set I put the wheel back together .
#text=Once the wheel was back on my bike I was off riding again .
